browsermonkey.render
Class Searcher

java.lang.Object
  browsermonkey.render.Searcher

public class Searcher
extends java.lang.Object

The Searcher class carries out all searching operations for the browser.

highlightSearchTerm

public static int highlightSearchTerm(java.text.AttributedString[] textRanges,
                                      java.lang.String term,
                                      java.util.Map<java.text.AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute,java.lang.Object> highlightAttributes)
Searches through the document highlighting any words that match the term provided.

Parameters:
textRanges - Static class used to store results
term - Term to be searched for
highlightAttributes - Adds a highlight attribute to any terms found
Returns:
Number of results found
